description:
Binary	Opcode	Description
00000000	HLT	Halt
00000001	LDA	Load from instruction to A
00000010	LDB	Load from instruction to B
00000011	STA	Store from A to memory adress
00000100	STB	Store from B to memory adress
00000101	STC	Store from C to memory adress
00000110	MEA	Load from memory to A
00000111	MEB	Load from memory to B
00001000	ADD	A+B=C
00001001	SUB	A-B=C
00001010	MUL	A*B=C
00001011	CMP	Compare A and B into C, if true c=00000001 else c=00000000 || adress 01 = >, adress 00 = <, adress 10 = ==
00001100	JMP	Jumps to adress in program memory
00001101	JIF	Jumps to adress if C = 00000001
00001110	OUT	Outputs memory adress 
00001111
name: 8 bit computer (4hz) ( PC )
